original_text: So he offered upon the altar which he had made in Bethel the fifteenth day of the eighth month, even in the month which he had devised of his own heart; and ordained a feast unto the children of Israel: and he offered upon the altar, and burnt incense.
korean_text: 그가 자기 마음대로 정한 달 곧 여덟째 달 열다섯째 날로 이스라엘 자손을 위하여 절기로 정하고 벧엘에 쌓은 제단에 올라가서 분향하였더라

sentences.original_text: So he offered upon the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 제단 위에 제사를 드렸고

sentences.original_text: which he had made in Bethel
fifteenth day of the eighth month
even in the month which he had devised of his own heart
sentences.korean_translation: 즉 그가 자기 마음으로 고안한 달이었다

sentences.original_text: and ordained a feast unto the children of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 자손들을 위한 절기를 제정하였다

sentences.original_text: and he offered upon the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 제단 위에 제사를 드렸다
